column9:
Thank you for your email. I will be working away from the office on Thursday 30th and Friday 31st July and will not have access to my email. If the matter is urgent please phone me on 0408 831 172. For all else I will do my best do respond to your email in a timely matter when I return to the office on Monday. Thanks for your patience and understanding.

Kind Regards.

Bianca Sowik
Business Development & Marketing Manager
Country Club Hotels & Resorts
Phone 0408 831 172
www.countryclubs.com.au
